value.halfverse: give praise, you servants of the LORD.
value.verse:
Hallelujah!
Praise the Name of the LORD; *

value.halfverse: in the courts of the house of our God.
value.verse: You who stand in the house of the LORD, *
Praise the LORD, for the LORD is good; *
value.halfverse: sing praises to his Name, for it is lovely.
and Israel for his own possession.
value.verse: For the LORD has chosen Jacob for himself *
For I know that the LORD is great, *
value.halfverse: and that our Lord is above all gods.

value.verse: The LORD does whatever pleases him, in heaven and on earth, *
value.halfverse: in the seas and all the deeps.

value.verse: He brings up rain clouds from the ends of the earth; *
value.halfverse:
he sends out lightning with the rain,
 and brings the winds out of his storehouse.

value.verse: It was he who struck down the firstborn of Egypt, *
value.halfverse: the firstborn both of man and beast.
against Pharaoh and all his servants.
value.verse: He sent signs and wonders into the midst of you, O Egypt, *

value.halfverse: and put mighty kings to death:
value.verse: He overthrew many nations *

value.halfverse: and all the kings of Canaan.
value.verse:
Sihon, king of the Amorites,
and Og, the kingdoms of Bashan, *

value.halfverse: an inheritance for Israel his people.
value.verse: He gave their land to be an inheritance, *

value.halfverse: your renown, O LORD, endures from age to age.
value.verse: O LORD, your Name is everlasting; *

value.halfverse: and shows compassion to his servants.
value.verse: For the LORD gives his people justice *

value.halfverse: the work of human hands.
value.verse: The idols of the heathen are silver and gold, *
They have mouths, but they cannot speak; *
value.halfverse: eyes have they, but they cannot see.
neither is there any breath in their mouth.
value.verse: They have ears, but they cannot hear; *

value.halfverse: and so are all who put their trust in them.
value.verse: Those who make them are like them, *

value.halfverse: O house of Aaron, bless the LORD.
value.verse: Bless the LORD, O house of Israel; *
Bless the LORD, O house of Levi; *
value.halfverse: you who fear the LORD, bless the LORD.

value.verse: Blessed be the LORD out of Zion, *
value.halfverse:
who dwells in Jerusalem.
 Hallelujah!
